attributes.action: Routine Covid-19 testing for Teaching Staff & Essential Workers
attributes.background: Show solidarity with the people who are keeping the country ticking over. Fortnightly Covid testing would make working during the pandemic less stressful. The mental health of these people is paramount.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Introduce weekly Covid-19 testing for school staff and students in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550053

Provide weekly Covid 19 tests for NHS staff and care workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329535

Make weekly COVID 19 tests for available for all Food retail workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551220
